=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Microblading Eyebrow Pen, Eyebrow Tattoo Liquid Pen (3 Pcs) , 2 in 1 Eyeliner Pencil, Waterproof brow Pen, Natural Looking, 24h Long Lasting (Red Brown) Review Date: 2021/06/14 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting, Natural Looking', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 1.02 x 0.47 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '750081905281'} Review Text: Super bad experience... came dry, not pigmented!

I don't recommend it Review Title: Came dry! Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms ASP ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} I just got this product at a beauty supply!

I love it!!! First time trying and it turned out awesome!!!!

I'm no a nail technician, or any sort of professional but it worked great, I did short, next time I'll do longer, after creating the nail I designed with some crystals!

So much cheaper, and I can do whatever I like going to a nail salon again!! I wish I knew this trick before! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not very impressed.. it acts just like a regular cheap mascara, nothing impressive about it. Didn’t notice much difference than regular mascaras BFWood BFWood {'Brand': 'BFWood', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Package Dimensions': '9.92 x 9.45 x 1.85 inches; 5.08 Ounces'} It’s a good brush, firm and sturdy but it does hurt the scalp a little bit, it’s good for brushing but it can hurt! It’s not very flexible. Firm brush 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} So while most magnetic eyeliners requires 2-3 min to dry, this one takes 20 to 30 seconds!

Such a nice kit, 5 pairs of different sizes and thickness lashes, very good quality.
This kit is worth the price and benefits of it! I’m excited with this kit! Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Got it for my girls!

It’s thick and not heavy and it doesn’t hurt as much! It won’t break easily and colored ones are cute pastel and the black ones are just as nice for adults

Good quality Good quality! Aestivate 6Pcs Large Hair Clips Claw Jaw Hair Clips Clamps Non-Slip Hair for Women Girls Hair Hair Accessories Aestivate {'Brand': 'Aestivate', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Yellow,Orange,Blue,Green,Beige,Pink', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '8.78 x 6.85 x 1.85 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '782910172229'} Bigger than I expected which is great because I have a lot of hair and long , It's a good quality plastic.
I wouldn't recommend for short hair, because the clips are really big / long Great! Eyebrow Pencil 3 Pcs Waterproof Dark Brown Long Lasting Eyebrow Makeup Pen with 4 Fork Tips Head Upgrade Design Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.88 x 2.17 x 0.79 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843551950'} Well deserved 5 stars!

Used on my eyebrows ( I do have eyebrows ) but they are not well defined like in the picture!..

This product does the job and so so so easily!!!!

I'm impressed, It also lasted all day long, looks natural and easy to shape up!

Highly recommend it Amazing! So impressed!!! Microblading Eyebrow Pen, Eyebrow Tattoo Liquid Pen (3 Pcs) , 2 in 1 Eyeliner Pencil, Waterproof brow Pen, Natural Looking, 24h Long Lasting (Red Brown) EINHOOM {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting, Natural Looking', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 1.02 x 0.47 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '750081905281'} Super bad experience... came dry, not pigmented!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty and Hair Enthusiast**: The user's passion for DIY beauty solutions persists, with a strong focus on makeup and hair accessories, enhancing their personal grooming routine.
- **Critical Review of Products**: The user remains discerning in evaluations, recently expanding their scrutiny to include makeup products. They emphasize comfort, effectiveness, and ease of use while being wary of products that fail to deliver on these criteria.
- **Cost-Conscious**: True to their value-driven outlook, the user consistently seeks high-quality, affordable beauty products that offer reliable performance and durability, ensuring their purchases align with their budget-conscious mindset.
- **Creative Expression**: The user continues to personalize their appearance through an array of hair and makeup accessories, favoring products that allow for creativity without compromising on results.
- **Novice to Moderate Skill Level**: As their beauty journey evolves, the user is becoming increasingly selective, gravitating toward items that deliver significant results tailored to their developing skill set.
- **Desire for Convenience and Performance**: With a focus on easy-to-use products, the user prioritizes effective performance, particularly those that offer lasting wear and clear instructions. Recent negative experiences with products lacking pigmentation have heightened their sensitivity to quality.

Overall, the user embodies a creative, cost-conscious beauty and hair enthusiast who is refining their selection process to emphasize quality, effectiveness, and personal satisfaction while navigating the complexities of DIY beauty.
